QuestData.Title: These Colors Don't Run
QuestData.Description: Bladespire has been a plague on my people for many years.$b$bThat ends today!$b$bNow to explain it to the ogres in a way they will understand.$b$bIf you still wish to help us, place our banner in the corpses of our adversaries. $b$bTheir courage will falter as they behold a field of Frostwolf trophies!$b$bThis is our way. I will meet with you ahead when you have completed this deed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use $1oa Frostwolf Banners on Bladespire Ogre corpses.
QuestData.RewardText: These are no ordinary enemies, yet you did not show any signs of weakness.
